participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and determined, Jordan has a competitive edge from playing basketball and is eager to start a new chapter in his career.
participant_1.background: my mother is a dentist. i'm currently looking for a job preferably at a restaurant. i like playing basketball. my favourite artist is travis scott. i have one older sister.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Caring and adventurous, Emily loves spending quality time outdoors with her dog and is dedicated to her career in sports.
participant_2.background: i am married to a doctor. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i am a professional tennis player. i live in a three storey house. my family is continuously growing.
